channel.title: Need server status cheker/monitor.(your name will be under the page if u help :)
channel.description: Hello. Well since in our page( no its not about moparscape, its runescape help page) Peoples ar asking for moparscape servers, we decided to make a script that auto add servers to database and eveyone could see them, but no we need to make server status cheker/monitor( it shows that server is online/offline). COuld anyone give me the Php/JS script or link to script/tutorial. I would put your name under the page. Thanks :)
